cards.title: Cascade
powers: You may discard up to 3 cards. You may move a card with an Aqua Cost of your discarded cards' total {magic} or less from the Riverbank to your discard, ignoring its Indestructable status. Draw until you have 4 cards.
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Riverbank
body: At the start of the game, take all River cards in {Cascade}'s deck and shuffle them together to create the River deck. Then, place the top 4 cards of the River deck under this card.
This card and all cards beneath this card are indestructible.
This card is not a hero, villain, or environment card.
After a card beneath this is played or moved to somewhere other than the River deck, move the top card from the River deck beneath this until there are 4 cards beneath this.

cards.title: Droplet
body: Aqua Cost: 1
Each Hero regains 1 HP.
You may move all cards beneath Riverbank to the bottom of the River deck in the same order, ignoring their indestructable status, and move the top four cards from the River deck beneath Riverbank.

cards.title: Water Surge
body: Aqua Cost: 1
{Cascade} deals 1 target 2 Cold Damage. {Cascade} regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Rushing Waters
body: Aqua Cost: 2
You may play 2 cards.

cards.title: Waterlog
body: Aqua Cost: 2
Destroy an Ongoing or Environment card.

cards.title: River-Worn Stone
powers: Move a card from your hand to the bottom of the River deck. {Cascade} deals 1 Target that card's {magic} Projectile Damage.
body: Aqua Cost: 3
You may draw an additional card during your Draw Phase.

cards.title: Rippled Visions
body: Aqua Cost: 3
Reveal the top card of the River deck. Place it on the top or bottom of the River deck. {Cascade} deals 1 target that card's {magic} Cold Damage.

cards.title: Condensed Orb
body: Aqua Cost: 4
2 Targets gain 3 HP.

cards.title: Storm Swell
body: Aqua Cost: 4
{Cascade} deals up to 2 Targets 4 Cold Damage.

cards.title: Rising Waters
body: Aqua Cost: 5
Increase Damage dealt by Hero Targets by 1.
At the start of your turn, destroy an Ongoing card.

cards.title: Perpetual Flow
body: Aqua Cost: 6
Play 1 card from the Riverbank. (It is treated as your card afterward.)

cards.title: Meeting The Ocean
powers: Discard up to 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, {Cascade} deals 1 target Cold Damage equal to that card's {magic}.

unusedCards.title: Stream Surge
body: {Cascade} deals up to 3 targets 1 Projectile Damage. You may play a card.

unusedCards.title: Diverging Waters
body: Draw 3 Cards. Play a Card. Move this card to the bottom of the River deck.

unusedCards.title: Shape the Stream
body: You may move a card from the Riverbank to your Trash, ignoring its Indestructable status. (You do not pay any Aqua Cost.)

dummyPromoCards.title: Cascade
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play.
dummyPromoCards.powers: Discard up to 2 cards with {magic} of 2 or more. For each card discarded this way, move 1 card from under Riverbank to the bottom of the River deck, ignoring its indestructible status. Move the card under the Riverbank with the lowest Gain Cost to your Trash, ignoring its indestructible status.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Perhaps I can manage with a little more control.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Here's hoping I can last enough to make things happen...

dummyPromoCards.title: Cascade
setup: At the start of the game, put The Riverbank into play.
dummyPromoCards.powers: Move 1 card from your hand to the bottom of the River deck. Select a card under Riverbank with an Aqua Cost of up to 2 higher than the moved card and move it to your Trash. Draw until you have 3 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Perhaps I can manage with a little more control.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Here's hoping I can last enough to make things happen...

dummyPromoCards.powers: Play 1 card from the Riverbank. (It is treated as your card afterward.) {Cascade} deals themselves Infernal Damage equal to the played card's Aqua Cost. Discard your hand. Draw 2 Cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
